display_name: Apnea Hypopnea Index (Non-Supine): (Apneas with >= 3% oxygen desaturation + hypopneas with > 50% flow reduction and >= 3% oxygen desaturation) / hours of sleep in non-supine position from type IV home sleep apnea test
description: Calculated - Summary metric of sleep disordered breathing events.The curent AASM guidelines refer this index to Respiratory Event Index (REI) since sleep is not directly recorded.
